mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO , CONTENT , WRITER , REG_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ content } , #{ writer } , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
